Process approach (see 5.4) Are processes employed effectively by: a) defining activities necessary to achieve desired financial and economic benefits within any process? b) fully recognizing and managing the interrelated and interdependent activities, resources, inputs and outputs of the process? c) establishing clear responsibility and accountability for employees in managing key activities? d) understanding capabilities of key activities or processes through measurement and analysis? e)
